job_description:
Company: AILabs
Position: Machine Learning Engineer
Location: Boston, MA (Hybrid)
Salary: $160,000 - $200,000

About Us:
AILabs is a leading artificial intelligence research and development company. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of AI and developing innovative solutions to real-world problems.

Job Description:
We are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to build and deploy cutting-edge ML models at scale. You will work on challenging problems and contribute to our AI-driven products.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models
- Implement and maintain ML pipelines
- Optimize models for performance and scalability
- Collaborate with researchers and engineers to translate research into production-ready solutions

Requirements:
- Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field
- 3+ years of experience in machine learning engineering
- Strong programming skills in Python
- Experience with deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with MLOps tools (e.g., Kubeflow, MLflow)
- Experience with deploying models to production

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunity to work on cutting-edge research
- Collaborative and supportive work environment
